title: The Sensitive Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/13/21
itunes:title: The Sensitive Soul - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/13/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Jawer explore his research into how human emotions develop the personality, and how savants, prodigies, psychic mediums and even animals have emotional consciousness that forms the feelings that shape our lives.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

George Noory and author Michael Jawer explore his research into how human emotions develop the personality, and how savants, prodigies, psychic mediums and even animals have emotional consciousness that forms the feelings that shape our lives.

itunes:summary: A discussion on how emotions create your reaction to the world around you.
